heading: 2.1 Creating a New Data Request
text: Navigate ‘Mesulam Center Data Requests’ database REDCap.‘Data Collection’ tab left panel, select ‘Add/Edit Records’.Click large green ‘+ Add new record’ button. create new Record ID allow select ‘Data Request’ ‘Status’ Instruments.

heading: 2.2 Filling out the Data Request Form: Video
2.2.1 Filling out the Data Request Form
text: Select Data Request Instrument button Data Collection Instruments.Fill ‘Request Information’ ‘Requestor Information’ Sections.Enter Date request, Requestor name, Requestor email. can person filling form person requested data.Enter names anyone else involved knowledgeable request.Select type Data Request.Fill ‘Request Data’ Section.Write brief description data request. sentences needed data request , known, requested.Enter short description request. words used create file name documents data request stored.Create new folder Data Requests Sharepoint. Copy paste calculated ‘File name’ name new folder. files data request stored.Select UDS version(s) needed.current REDCap data, select UDS3.historical data StudyTracker, select MDS/UDS1/UDS2.Select location(s) raw data request.Fill ‘Request Tagging’ Section.Select ‘Impact/Need’ score slider scale.Select concern completion project.Select ‘Scope’ project.Select approximate total time ‘Duration’ finish project.fields return priority score, can used prioritize -progress projects.Select reason(s) scope choice.Fill ‘Storage Locations’ Section – can done immediately data request complete.Paste link Data Request folder.Sharepoint, left click folder data request. Select ‘Share’. window pop options send link folder.
